original: Bogren, Johan Aron, kontraktsprost, Uddevalla, f. 18/12/73 i Enslöv, Hall. 1. G. 03 m. Hanna Crona. Barn: Gunnar, f. 04, rev :sekr, Sthlm, Ingmar 06, kyrkoh., Romedan da, Yngve 08, rektor, Eslöv, Gunvor 11, lärov :-adj., g. m. lärov :adj. Allan Widén, Uddevalla. — Mog:ex. i Halmstad 93, teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 94, teor. teol. ex. i Lund 96, prakt. teol. ex, 97, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 98. Kyrkoadj. i Masthuggs församl. i Gbg 03-07, kommin. i Annedals församl. där 08, pred. v. Gbgs sjukhem 09, kyrkoh. i Uddevalla sed. 22, kontr :prost i Älvsysslets norra kontr. sed. 40. Ordif. i skodstyr. 0. kyrkofullm., insp. f. Uddevalla h. a. 1. samt komm. flicksk. LNO.
translated: Bogren, Johan Aron, parish priest, Uddevalla, b. December 18th, 1873 in Enslöv, Halland. First marriage in 1903 to Hanna Crona. Children: Gunnar, b. 1904, civil servant in Stockholm; Ingmar, b. 1906, parish priest in Romedal, Norway; Yngve, b. 1908, principal in Eslöv; Gunvor, b. 1911, teacher's assistant, married to teacher's assistant Allan Widén, Uddevalla. Studied at Halmstad high school 1893, theology and philosophy at Uppsala University 1894, theoretical theology at Lund University 1896, practical theology exam in 1897, ordained as a minister in Gothenburg diocese in 1898. Served as church assistant in Masthuggs parish in Gothenburg from 1903-1907, curate in Annedals parish from 1908, preacher at Gothenburg's hospital in 1909, parish priest in Uddevalla since 1922, district dean (kontraktsprost) in Älvsyssel northern district since 1940. Chairman of the School Board, member of the Church Council, inspector for Uddevalla High School, and Commissioner for the Girls' School LNO.
